TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {3285=There are both on-campus and off-campus jobs available for eligible students. The on-campus pay rate is currently $8.75 an hour, effective for 2015. The off-campus pay rate varies depending on the job. You are paid only for hours worked in the job in which we place you, and you may not work beyond your award. Work-Study students may work up to 20 hours a week., 3705=Students who are interested in applying for Federal Work-Study (FWS) for Fall 2014/Spring 2015 must complete a 2014-2015 FAFSA and indicate an interest in Work-Study. Also, the student must complete a CUNY Supplement form (found within the Student Self-Service area of CUNYfirst)., 1915=Work-Study appointments will take place February 3rd, 4th and 5th, 2015. Appointments can be made at the front desk, starting February 2nd, 2015., 1173=Exempt from withholding (IT-2104 E)}
textBeforeTable: Work-Study Payroll Calendar 2015/2016 Guidelines for Supervisors of College Work Study Students Student Instructions for Work-Study - Please print out and read before coming in for placement. Labor Law Form- Please complete employee section only Confidentiality Statement Employment Eligibility Verification (I-9 Form) (Please review the checklist of acceptable identification to be submitted with the I-9. Documents must be up to date and not expired) Exempt from withholding (IT-2104 E) Employee NYS withholding (IT-2104) Employee’s New York State Withholding Forms (complete one of the following) Employee’s Federal Withholding Form (W-4 Form) When you come in for placement, you must bring all required documents with you. Work-Study appointments will take place February 3rd, 4th and 5th, 2015. Appointments can be made at the front desk, starting February 2nd, 2015. Work-Study Placement Appointments **Please make sure that you “Accept” your award before you come in for placement **Only students who meet these criteria can make an appointment for Work-Study placement Must meet other eligibility requirements (e.g., citizenship, selective service, etc.) Must not owe a refund of  a Federal PELL Grant or Federal SEOG or other federal aid Must not be in default of a Federal Perkins Loan or a Direct Loan
